testCheckJwt_ValidToken() - Method in class middlewareapd.service.MiddlewareServiceTest
Tests the MiddlewareService.checkJwt(String) method with a valid JWT token.
testConcurrentLogoutDuringValidation() - Method in class middlewareapd.service.MiddlewareConcurrencyTest
Test to validate that a race condition between JWT validation and user logout is correctly managed by ensuring that the logout action takes precedence.
testConcurrentTokenUpdate() - Method in class middlewareapd.service.MiddlewareConcurrencyTest
Test to validate that concurrent updates to the same token are handled properly by using a write lock to prevent race conditions.
